content: व्यापृ {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be engaged in or occupied with, be busy about (with <ab>loc.</ab>). {@--2@} To be employed or placed (in any office). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to work, engage upon, entrust with, appoint to (usually with <ab>loc.</ab>); व्यापारितः शूलभृता विधाय सिंहत्वमंकागतसत्ववृत्ति <ls>R. 2. 38</ls>; आत्मजनानुष्ठेये कर्मणि त्वां व्यापारयितुमिच्छामि <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To place, sot, fix, direct, cast; व्यापारयामास करं किरीटे <ls>R. 6. 19</ls>; उमामुख… व्यापारयामास विलोचनानि <ls>Ku. 3. 67</ls>; व्यापारितं शिरसि शस्त्रमशस्त्रपाणेः <ls>Ve. 3. 19</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 25</ls>; <ls>M. 3. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To use, employ; <ls>Mu. 7. 16.</ls>
